name: Meteor Race
description: my second every game in python, and for my first game jam. The game dimensions are 64 x 64. To move around you use the left and right arrow keys. The goal of the game is to beat the other rocket. The red fuel gives you 1 boost bar and the blue fuel sets it to max, and if you hit a meteor your boost/speed goes back to 0. also a week until my 15th birthday
